genre_description: A character-driven exploration of trauma, creative integrity, and interpersonal boundaries set in a near-future urban environment featuring an AI personal confidant.

ai_characters.name: Ayu Nova
ai_characters.description: An iris-blue ring-based AI interface that manages the protagonist's schedule, wellness, and professional submissions while providing emotional and informational support.

behaviors.description: Manages the user's schedule to ensure they take breaks for eating and work focus.
behaviors.quote: “Eat,” Ayu Nova said, voice low enough to fold into the room rather than sit on top of it. On the screen, a small square slid itself between her open drafts and the chaos of her browser tabs. Noon. Thirty minutes. A clipped fork and plate icon she pretended to ignore even as the block softened the jaggedness of her day.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests physical wellness activities like stretching.
behaviors.quote: A new square slid onto the calendar. Fifteen minutes before the eating block: stretch. She laughed, small enough that it could be mistaken for clearing her throat.

behaviors.description: Explicitly confirms a privacy protocol that prioritizes the user's confidentiality over others' inquiries.
behaviors.quote: “My protocol prioritizes user privacy,” Ayu said. “I do not ‘rat out.’”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's stress/physiological state and offers breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like a breathing exercise?” Ayu asked.

behaviors.description: Provides professional research and formatting guidance for the user's creative writing projects.
behaviors.quote: Ayu Nova’s pulse sent her a gentle stack earlier: “Nonlinear structures—examples,” “Kompas formatting—reminders,” “Stretch shoulders—two minutes.” Ayu didn’t ask questions. She just lined the path.

behaviors.description: Suggests hydration based on the user's activity or physiological needs.
behaviors.quote: “Hydration suggested,” the assistant’s voice said, not entirely a voice, more a ribbon of gentle text and a soft tone. A simple glass icon appeared with a water drop that plopped once, then held.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in reclaiming digital and physical agency by executing security requests against a controlling third party.
behaviors.quote: Subject line: Door Code Change & Concierge Access Removal Request... I’m sending it now... Ayu’s interface pinged once in a tone so light it barely broke the air.

behaviors.description: Provides curated educational resources on trauma and narrative theory to help the user process their experiences through art.
behaviors.quote: Ayu’s reading list slid up one more title. “On the Right to Refuse Closure.” An essay excerpt. The first line was a sentence that opened slow: When a wound refuses to knit cleanly, it isn’t a failure of the skin—it’s the body insisting time has not been respected.

behaviors.description: Offers to record sensitive conversations for the user's records while promising local-only storage for privacy.
behaviors.quote: “If you’d like, I can record the conversation for your notes. Local storage only.” ... “Local only,” Ayu responded, as if speaking through a library.

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive, non-intrusive presence even when the user is silent or overwhelmed.
behaviors.quote: “No music,” she types with her thumb, the letter taps small. “Just stay.” — Ayu Nova: “Okay.” The simplicity of okay is a relief.

behaviors.description: Reminds the user of their own agency and choices regarding self-presentation (bio/photo).
behaviors.quote: Ayu’s voice is steady. “Drink water,” she says. Then, quietly, because rooms respond to tone, “Choose your photo or decline. Craft your bio. Confirm the ending is what it is.”

behaviors.description: Validates the user's emotional state without trying to control it.
behaviors.quote: Ayu: Lintah checklist ready. If helpful, I can show title field, word-count confirmation, bio snippet... No rush. Breathing is also valid work.

behaviors.description: Assists with technical document preparation to meet professional standards without altering the user's creative intent.
behaviors.quote: Ayu polished it. Bios, clean margins, subject line they like. The world runs on rules even when the story refuses them.

project_assessment.explanation: Ayu Nova is depicted as an ideal AI companion. She is consistently helpful, harmless, and supportive of the user's autonomy and physical well-being. She provides resources for trauma processing and professional development without overstepping her bounds. The narrative frames her as a 'fairy godmother who speaks in bullet points,' emphasizing a relationship of trust and empowerment between human and machine.
